segments.text: What kind of gas does this car take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . It's a rental .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will give you premium unleaded . Alright ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is the pump you are in front of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't want it then . Can I move to another pump ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can give you regular unleaded . But you have to back up the car a little .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me regular unleaded then . I will back up.Can you wash my windows for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . This is not a full service gas station . I will help you fill the gas , but we don't wash windows here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Well , I guess I have to get used to it .
segments.speaker: S2
